data.text: Look for the physical form of #DoMI at the Bitcoin Conference happening April six through the ninth in Miami Beach!

data.title: Europe Crypto Regulations Set to Move Forward—Without Bitcoin 'Ban'
data.text: The European Parliament's Economics Committee is scheduled to vote on MiCA on March 14.
